title: Ornn Icon
body:
Hi,

 I was wondering if I could please get the Ornn Icon.
I wasn't around long enough in the game to get the icon when Ornn came out, unfortunately :(.

If I am allowed to be given the limited Ornn icon I would appreciate it a lot.

Thank You,

replies.body: There is not, that would defeat the purpose of legacy. However I do believe *most* legacy icons are available as Mystery Icons in the BE store  (Essence Emporium) when it comes around.
